description: Pleasant ramble through old forest, great views from the peak.
directions:
Drive to end of Mt Stewart Road in the Highlands.
From #1, go NorthEast on Helmcken 300m to Burnside and go left (North).  Follow it around and turn right (North) on Prospect Lake Road.  in 1.1km go left (NW) on Munns Road.  In ~2km, turn left (West) onto Highland Road drive 2km to trails.
title: Mount Stewart
